title: Honeymoon is go!
html:
To anyone who's following along: We're on our honeymoon! Which means that the wedding went overwhelmingly well. We missed our plane on the way out here - overslept due to complete exhaustion - but then lucked out on standby and got seats next to each other.

If you're lucky and interested, you might be able to find updates via my Flickr account.

Also, I see that Marc has wished us well - thank you much!
body:
To anyone who's following along: We're on our honeymoon! Which means that the wedding went overwhelmingly well. We missed our plane on the way out here - overslept due to complete exhaustion - but then lucked out on standby and got seats next to each other.

If you're lucky and interested, you might be able to find updates via my Flickr account.

Also, I see that Marc has wished us well - thank you much!
